Method Detail

prepareNodeForModification

protected INode prepareNodeForModification(long paramNodeKey)
                                    throws org.treetank.exception.TTIOException
Prepare a node for modification. This is getting the node from the (persistence) layer, storing the page in the cache and setting up the node for upcoming modification. Note that this only occurs for INodes.

Parameters:
paramNodeKey - key of the node to be modified
Returns:
an INode instance
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.TTIOException - if IO Error

finishNodeModification

protected void finishNodeModification(INode paramNode)
Finishing the node modification. That is storing the node including the page in the cache.

Parameters:
paramNode - the node to be modified

protected INode createNode(INode paramNode)
                    throws org.treetank.exception.TTIOException

Parameters:
paramNode - node to add
Returns:
Unmodified node from parameter for convenience.
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.TTIOException - if IO Error

commit

public void commit(PageReference reference)
            throws org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException
Committing a a writetransaction. This method is recursivly invoked by all PageReferences.

Parameters:
reference - to be commited
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException - if the write fails
